post.author: 0m1n0u5
post.body:
My project is called "Decay". It is situated in the far future, in and around an old building, which hasn't been used properly for decades. The main character/the player, is looking for a man, with whom he has unfinished business. I tried to give the map a goth/industrial look, as it fits the story. The story itself will be narated by the main character, in cinematics. There is only one weapon- the machinegun with some minor modifications to it (different sound, different tracer model, faster rate of fire, larger clip, different skin, and some other). There are new skins for the enemies that the player will encounter. No models unfortunately, because I don't know anything about modeling... The battle is going to be played in a very destructive environment. Expect columns to burst, marble tiles to fall, and something more... But that's a surprise .

Here are some screens from my level. Keep in mind that polishing the rough edges and some texture changes, are the next step .
